Source.Name: libarcus
Source.Summary: Communication library between internal components for Ultimaker software
Source.Description: This library contains C++ code and Python3 bindings for creating a socket in a thread and using this socket to send and receive messages based on the Protocol Buffers library. It is designed to facilitate the communication between Cura and its backend and similar code.
